short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for your browser that makes editing the source code of your website easy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Edit source code of your website without leaving your tab.

Have you ever needed to make a quick change to the source code of a website, but didn't want to go through the hassle of opening up your development tools?

Source Patch allows you to do just that, right from within your browser.
Simply click on the extension icon and a panel will pop up, giving you access to the source code of the website you're currently on.

Make changes to the code just like you would in any other code editor.

When you're finished making your changes, just click the "Create change request" button to give a pull request to GitHub with your changes.


Features

- Search file contents and update source code
- Code editor with syntax highlighting
- Automatically create a pull request to GitHub with your changes

For all feature requests or bug reports, please visit the GitHub repository and fill in an issue https://github.com/MrRobz/Source-Patch

Privacy Policy

Source Patch doesn't track you or share/care about your data at all. GitHub tokens are only needed only to to access private repositories or exceed GitHub API rate limit. Source Patch stores tokens in your browser storage and only uses them to authenticate with GitHub.
